channel.title: [508 HD] High Definition Client Error [508 HD]
channel.description: I am Coding a 508 HD Server and a 508 HD Client. While I was working on the client, I found something out that I am having alot of trouble fixing. When I hit login, It's fine for about 5 Seconds, then It logs me out, and gives me this client error.... [IMG]http://i718.photobucket.com/albums/ww182/RuneScapeWPS/Error.jpg[/img] I have tried fixing it Many Many Times, but no success. Also, it does NOT Close the client, only won't Login. Any Help would be Great. - RuneScapeWPS

item.title: [508 HD] High Definition Client Error [508 HD]

item.description:
@RuneScapeWPS wrote:

Yeah I know, I wanna get this thing fixed already. Wolfs goal, what did you do to get rid of this problem?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2008, 07:27:35 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2008, 08:55:32 pm[/size][hr]anyone at all?

wolfs goal:

as i said in another post hd clients fail badly…

They do not, they just need work. I am working on making my own and not Leeching it from someone else. I am not asking people to keep downing me and dissing me for going HD, I am looking for Help to fix this. If you are not going to help me, then don’t post here.
